name: DEMON PUNCHER
description:
DEMON PUNCHER is a short Punch-Out!! style game about punching demons.

This game is currently in development. The currently available build only contains one simple and easy boss.

This game was made for LOWREZJAM 2020.

Controls

  • Tap Left/Right - Dodge
  • Hold Left/Right - Strafe
  • Hold Up - Block
  • Tap X/Z - Jab

Planned Upcoming

  • Window scale toggling
  • Title screen
  • 3 more bosses

Known Bugs

  • Boss can be stun-locked infinitely after dodging an attack and alternating left and right jabs.
